generate_react_component.description: üåü PRIMARY TOOL FOR REACT COMPONENTS: Generate React components with full design system integration. Automatically applies design tokens from config/design-tokens.json, component patterns from config/component_patterns.json, proper TypeScript types, and responsive Tailwind CSS classes. USE THIS INSTEAD OF write_file for ALL .tsx/.jsx files. IMPORTANT: Use 'file_path' parameter for full path (e.g., demo/src/app/store/uiSlice.ts) OR 'output_dir' for directory only.

guidelines.pattern_selection:
CRITICAL: Choose component_pattern based on PURPOSE, not just name. Pattern determines the HTML structure and semantic meaning:
  ‚Ä¢ sidebar: Navigation panels with menu items (ChatSidebar, UserSidebar, NavPanel)
  ‚Ä¢ header: Top bars with logo, search, actions (AppHeader, ChatHeader, DashboardHeader)
  ‚Ä¢ footer: Bottom bars with links and info (AppFooter, ChatFooter, PageFooter)
  ‚Ä¢ messages: Chat message displays with bubbles (ChatMessageList, MessageThread, ConversationView)
  ‚Ä¢ input: Message/chat input fields with actions (ChatInput, MessageInput, CommentBox)
  ‚Ä¢ form: Data entry forms with fields and validation (LoginForm, SignupForm, ProfileForm)
  ‚Ä¢ list: Vertical lists of items (UserList, ProductList, NotificationList)
  ‚Ä¢ card: Information cards with title/description (ProductCard, ProfileCard, StatCard)
  ‚Ä¢ button: Action buttons (CTAButton, SubmitButton, ActionButton)
  ‚Ä¢ hero: Large hero sections (HeroSection, Banner)
  ‚Ä¢ modal: Overlay dialogs (ConfirmModal, EditModal)
  ‚Ä¢ feature: Feature showcases (FeatureCard, BenefitCard)
  ‚Ä¢ pricing: Pricing cards (PricingCard, PlanCard)
guidelines.naming_convention: Use PascalCase for component names. Name should reflect purpose: ChatSidebar (sidebar pattern), ChatInput (input pattern), UserList (list pattern), LoginForm (form pattern).
guidelines.responsive_requirements: ALL components must be responsive. Use Tailwind breakpoints: base styles for mobile, then sm:, md:, lg:, xl: for larger screens. Hidden elements on mobile should use 'hidden md:flex' or similar.
guidelines.common_mistakes: DON'T use 'card' pattern for everything! ChatSidebar is NOT a card, it's a sidebar. ChatInput is NOT a card, it's an input. Choose pattern based on semantic meaning and UI structure, not just because it's a component.

parameters.page_path: Path to the page file to update (required)
parameters.components: List of components with 'name' and 'path' keys (required)
parameters.replace_all: Replace all imports or add to existing (default: false)

update_page_imports.returns: Updated page file with new imports

generate_page_with_components.description: ‚≠ê MAIN PAGE GENERATOR: Generate a complete page with multiple components automatically. This is the BEST tool for creating pages - it generates all components first (or reuses existing ones), then creates the page with proper imports and RESPONSIVE layout. Automatically enables Redux state management with mock data. Also creates missing Next.js project files (package.json, tsconfig.json, etc.) if needed. Use this instead of manually calling generate_react_component multiple times.

parameters.page_path: REQUIRED: Full path where page file should be created (e.g., './demo/src/app/page.tsx')
parameters.components: REQUIRED: Array of component specs, each with: {'name': 'ComponentName', 'pattern': 'card|button|hero|form|modal|list', 'variant': 'primary|secondary', 'props_data': {...}}
parameters.title: OPTIONAL: Page title for display
parameters.layout_type: OPTIONAL: Layout type - 'chat' (sidebar+main+footer), 'dashboard' (header+grid), 'landing' (full-width sections), 'app' (sidebar+content), or 'grid' (default 3-column responsive grid). Automatically generates responsive layouts for web, tablet, and mobile.

generate_page_with_components.returns: Complete page with all components generated and imported, plus project config files if missing
generate_page_with_components.usage_notes: ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Always provide BOTH page_name AND page_path. Component pattern must be one of: card, button, hero, form, modal, list, feature, pricing. Use layout_type to control page structure: 'chat' for messaging apps, 'dashboard' for analytics, 'landing' for marketing pages, 'app' for standard web apps, or 'grid' for simple layouts. All layouts are RESPONSIVE (mobile, tablet, desktop). This tool automatically creates package.json, enables Redux with mock data, and generates responsive layouts.

guidelines.pattern_is_mandatory: CRITICAL: Every component in the 'components' array MUST have a 'pattern' field. No defaults are provided. If pattern is missing, generation will FAIL. Choose pattern based on component's semantic purpose.

pattern_selection_by_layout.chat: For chat layouts, use: sidebar (navigation/conversations), header (user info/status), messages (message display), input (message input), footer (status/info)
pattern_selection_by_layout.dashboard: For dashboard layouts, use: header (page title/actions), card (metrics/stats), list (data lists), form (filters/settings)
pattern_selection_by_layout.landing: For landing pages, use: hero (main banner), feature (benefits), pricing (plans), button (CTAs), card (testimonials)
pattern_selection_by_layout.app: For app layouts, use: sidebar (main nav), header (top bar), card (content cards), form (data entry), list (item lists)

guidelines.component_examples:
CORRECT examples:
  ‚Ä¢ {'name': 'ChatSidebar', 'pattern': 'sidebar'} - NOT 'card'
  ‚Ä¢ {'name': 'ChatInput', 'pattern': 'input'} - NOT 'form' or 'card'
  ‚Ä¢ {'name': 'MessageList', 'pattern': 'messages'} - NOT 'list' or 'card'
  ‚Ä¢ {'name': 'AppHeader', 'pattern': 'header'} - NOT 'card'
  ‚Ä¢ {'name': 'LoginForm', 'pattern': 'form'} - NOT 'card'
  ‚Ä¢ {'name': 'ProductCard', 'pattern': 'card'} - This IS correct for cards
guidelines.layout_component_mapping:
Match layout to appropriate components:
  ‚Ä¢ chat layout needs: sidebar, header, messages, input, footer patterns
  ‚Ä¢ dashboard layout needs: header, card (for metrics), list patterns
  ‚Ä¢ landing layout needs: hero, feature, pricing, button patterns
  ‚Ä¢ app layout needs: sidebar, header, card, form, list patterns
